org.kitteh.irc.client.library

Interface AuthManager


  • public interface AuthManager
    Manages authentication.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void authenticate()
      Attempts to authenticate with the server's authentication system as defined in this manager.
      void reclaimNick(String nick)
      Attempts to reclaim a nickname.
      void setAuthType(AuthType authType)
      Sets the authentication type to utilize.
      void setPassword(String password)
      Sets the authentication password.
      void setUsername(String username)
      Sets the authentication password.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        void authenticate()
        Attempts to authenticate with the server's authentication system as defined in this manager.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if auth type or details are not set
        IllegalStateException - if authentication cannot occur at this time
        See Also:
        to set in builder, to set authentication type, to set password, to set username

      • reclaimNick

        void reclaimNick(@Nonnull
                 String nick)
        Attempts to reclaim a nickname.
        Parameters:
        nick - nickname to reclaim
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if not supported by the selected AuthType

      • setAuthType

        void setAuthType(@Nonnull
                 AuthType authType)
        Sets the authentication type to utilize.
        Parameters:
        authType - authentication type
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if authType is null

      • setPassword

        void setPassword(@Nonnull
                 String password)
        Sets the authentication password.
        Parameters:
        password - password
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if password is null or contains spaces/invalid characters

      • setUsername

        void setUsername(@Nonnull
                 String username)
        Sets the authentication password.
        Parameters:
        username - username
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if username is null or contains spaces/invalid characters
